Introduction

Cosmic Girls ενύπνιον (The Dreamer) is a sub-unit of the girl group WJSN, the unit consists of SeolA, Bona, Luda, Dawon and Mei Qi. They are the creators of dreams. They are in the third-year at WJSN School of Wizardry and they specialize in making your dreams a reality. They are described as holy and graciously fascinating.
